Package fernuni.propra.file_processing

Class Room

java.lang.Object
fernuni.propra.file_processing.Room
public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
A rectilinear room shape defined by given points.
Author:
Marius Mielke (4531230)

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room​(java.lang.String id, java.util.List<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float> corners, java.util.List<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float> lamps) throws IncorrectShapeException
      Main constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - room ID
      corners - list of points defining the room shape
      lamps - list of lamp positions
      Throws:
      IncorrectShapeException - exception for an invalid room definition
